content: Regular Shares Savings Plans (RSS) Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 15 Jan 2019Which is the best RSS platform the community recommends? Also with the fee per transaction is it really worth it. If yes, is there high risk when we buy?1 answerAnswerBump0

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 15 Jan 2019You can read this article posted by Seedly to make an informed decision: https://blog.seedly.sg/which-regular-savings-plan-is-the-cheapest/Whether it is high risk or not is subjective. Some people may think it is high risk. In that case a Fixed Deposit or a savings account would be better. Conversely, there are people who think that it is a low risk investment instrument.Whether it is high risk or not is determined by yourself. You may read this article to learn more before deciding: https://blog.seedly.sg/regular-savings-plan-the-piggy-bank-for-working-adults/0 comments0
